description: Try our easy to follow Prawn & Cucumber Poke Bowl recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Prawn & Cucumber Poke Bowl Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 large avocado, sliced (cut into star shapes, if you like)
1 small red chilli, deseeded, finely chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Cook rice as per packet instructions.

Line a baking tray with baking paper. Combine 2 tbs rice wine vinegar and 2 tsp sugar in a jug and microwave for 30 seconds or until sugar is dissolved. Cool and add to rice. Gently stir with a fork. Spread onto prepared tray and cool.
Place cabbage into a bowl. Add remaining vinegar and sugar and toss to combine. Stand for 20 minutes. Drain.
Combine lemon juice, soy, oils, honey, ginger, garlic, chilli, salt and pepper in a bowl. Add prawns and toss. Stand for 10 minutes to marinate.
Spoon rice into bowls. Top with cabbage, cucumber, prawns and avocado. Sprinkle with onion, coriander and sesame seeds. Serve with lemon wedges on the side.
